泊松方程模版

2017-06-21

根据上一节对于泊松方程的基本解法熟悉之后，我们得出一个基本套路：

第一句永远先是from fenics import *, 之后是bc，然后是a和L, 最后求解。

一般形式如下：

from fenics import *

bc

mesh, FunctionSpace, u_D, boundary, bc

mesh = UnitSquareMesh(8,8)
V = FunctionSpace(mesh,'P',1)
u_D = Expression('', degree = 1)
def boundary(x, on_boundary):
    return on_boundary
bc = Dirichlet(V, u_D, boundary)

a&L

f, u, v, a(u,v), L(v)

f = Expression('', degree = 1)
u = TrialFunction(V)
v = TestFunction(V)
a = dot(grad(u), grad(v))*dx
L = f*v*dx

solve

u, solve, plot, vtkfile

u = Function(V)
solve(a == L, u, bc)
%matplotlib inline
plot(u)
vtkfile = File('xxx.pvd')
vtkfile << u
